member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Xml.SR
member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Xml.SR.ClearCustomStrings
member.summary: Removes all custom strings.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Xml.SR.ContainsCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether a custom string is defined for the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource for which to search.
member.returns: true if a custom string is defined for the specified string resource; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Xml.SR.GetCustomString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The custom string that is stored for the specified string resource, if any.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.Products.Text.Addons.Xml.SR.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.summary: Returns the resolved value of the specified string resource, by calling String.Format using supplied arguments.
member.param: The name of the resource to get.
The arguments to pass to String.Format.
member.returns: The value of the resource localized for the caller's current culture settings. If a best match is not possible, is returned.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.IXmlSchemaResolver.DefaultNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the default XML namespace to use.
member.value: The default XML namespace to use.
member.remarks: The default namespace is used to mimic an xmlns attribute setting on the root element, if no xmlns attribute is present. It sets an empty-string-keyed value into the dictionary.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.IXmlSchemaResolver.DefaultNamespacePrefixMappings
member.summary: Gets the mapping dictionary of namespace prefix to namespaces that are declared by default without the need for xmlns attributes in elements.
member.value: The mapping dictionary of namespace prefix to namespaces that are declared by default without the need for xmlns attributes in elements.
member.remarks:
The dictionary keys are namespace prefixes and the values are namespaces. The namespace declarations in this dictionary are used to mimic xmlns attribute settings on the root element when no xmlns declaration attributes for the specified namespace prefix keys are present.
The property is simply a wrapper for setting an empty-string-keyed value in this dictionary.

member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the folder where DTDs are located.
member.value: The path to the folder where DTDs are located.
member.remarks: This property is only used when the property is set to Dtd or SchemaWithDtd. If this property is left , no explicit base path will be set for DTD loading. If this property is set, it should be the path to the folder that contains the DTDs that may be referenced.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.Implementation.XmlValidator.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the validation mode used by the validator.
member.value: The validation mode used by the validator. The default value is Schema.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.XmlElementSpacingMode
member.summary: The element spacing modes that an can use.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.XmlElementSpacingMode.Preserve
member.summary: The element spacing is not modified.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.XmlElementSpacingMode.NormalizeEmptyLines
member.summary: Elements will be separated by an empty line and extra empty lines will be removed.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Text.Languages.Xml.XmlElementSpacingMode.RemoveEmptyLines
member.summary: Elements will be on their own line an empty lines will be removed.
